you_have_accepted: [CY] You have accepted to be digitally authorised to file online for
what_happens_now: [CY] What happens now you’ve accepted to be digitally authorised
bullet_list: [CY] file most information online for this company without the authentication code

weve_sent_an_email_to_the_company: [CY] We’ve sent an email to the company’s registered email address and to any other people who are digitally authorised. We’ve let them know you are now digitally authorised to file for this company.
